ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not just our charms and DoT s fortunately.  All spell effects that can be cast on an enemy mob remain on a charmed mob.  In addition, all spell effects
ygData.messageBody:
It's not just our charms and DoT's fortunately. All spell effects that can
be cast on an enemy mob remain on a charmed mob. In addition, all spell
effects which can be cast on a pet mob remain when the mob uncharms. I
first discovered it with my enchanter, but found my bard could do it as
well.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 1:00 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Macros


Really? Cripes, don't mention it on the EQ board...

Kenross Cantoforjado, 53 songs, Innoruuk
